question: Which fin-tech company has launched its own Mini app store?
explanation:
Digital payments firm Paytm has recently launched a mini-app store, with an aim to support Indian developers.
This initiative is seen as a direct challenge to Google in the App store system. The payment app was earlier temporarily removed from Googleâ€™s Play Store for violating developer guidelines. Paytm provides listing and distribution of these mini-apps within its application.
